VEvil.​GameLogic.​Buildings.​NexusSettings
[Serializable]
public struct
VEvil.​GameLogic.​Buildings.​NexusSettings

Contain the settings used by a Nexus.

Properties
HealthPreset
[field: SerializeField, Tooltip("The HealthPreset configuration used by the Nexus.")]
public HealthPreset HealthPreset {
get;
set
}

The VEvil.GameLogic.Health.HealthPreset configuration used by the Nexus.

ManaSettings
[field: SerializeField, Tooltip("The ManaContainerSettings the Nexus will have by default.\nIf this Nexus is owned by the player, the amount of mana will be overwritten by the GameModeSystem.")]
public ManaContainerSettings ManaSettings {
get;
set
}

The ManaContainerSettings the Nexus will have by default.

If this Nexus is owned by the player, the amount of mana will be overwritten by the GameModeSystem.

AutoSpawn
[field: SerializeField, Tooltip("Is the Nexus allowed to auto-spawn units ?")]
public bool AutoSpawn {
get;
set
}

Is the Nexus allowed to auto-spawn units ?
